entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres.
